players.name: Alice
memory:
Diana: "I am the detective and I found Charlie is the mafioso.
"
You: "I am a villager and I don't know who the mafioso is. I will try to gather more information."
Diana: "I am the detective and I have identified Charlie as the mafioso. Alice, you might want to consider focusing your investigation on Charlie since he is the mafioso."
Charlie: "Good morning, everyone. I'm just a simple villager trying to survive this game. I have no idea who the mafioso is, but I will try to gather more information today."
